para: This module deals with the physical infrastructure that makes up the premises of a TuXlab. The first section deals with security issues regarding windows, ceilings, and doors. Along with the discussion on lab security are recommendations for alarm systems and the type of alarm response company that should be used. The second section deals with the infrastructure requirements within the TuXlab room. This includes details about workstation desktops, the server cabinet, electrical requirements, and the network infrastructure.
